body_html:
I did some refactoring for MaxPoolingOp which now uses functors and templates and registers kernels using TF_CALL_*. Since currently there more kernels for gpu then cpu, functors are not generalized to devices. Also adding double required a minor tweak to stream_executor (merely duplicating methods for double). I also added python tests with double now. This should fix #547

I also updated registered ops to use more general type - realnumbertype. Note, since I am not using default type for T ops compatibility test fails. Therefore, I have not updated yet ops.pbtxt.

I also would like to add MaxPool3dGradGrad (currently I added only forward declaration for it).

As this pull request is getting quite big, I would appreciate some comments.

body:
I did some refactoring for `MaxPoolingOp` which now uses functors and templates and registers kernels using `TF_CALL_*`. Since currently there more kernels for gpu then cpu, functors are not generalized to devices. Also adding `double` required a minor tweak to `stream_executor` (merely duplicating methods for `double`). I also added python tests with `double` now. This should fix #547

I also updated registered ops to use more general type - `realnumbertype`. Note, since I am not using default type for `T` ops compatibility test fails. Therefore, I have not updated yet `ops.pbtxt`.

I also would like to add `MaxPool3dGradGrad` (currently I added only forward declaration for it).

As this pull request is getting quite big, I would appreciate some comments.
